name: Bum Fights
storyline:
With fast-paced action and intense combat, Bum Fights is a game that will keep you on your toes as you battle against other players in arenas filled with obstacles and hazards. Use a variety of weapons, from rusty knives to throwing rocks, to knock out your opponents and become the last one standing.

But be warned: the competition is fierce, and only the strongest and most skilled players will emerge victorious. With customizable characters and a range of game modes, there's always a new challenge waiting in Bum Fights.

So what are you waiting for? Get your friends together and enter the arena to prove your worth as the ultimate medieval bum fighter!
summary: Get ready to brawl like never before in Bum Fights! - the ultimate online multiplayer top-down shooter game! Set in a nostalgic medieval world, this game lets you take on the role of a homeless warrior, fighting for survival and glory.
